attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
legal action should be taken against fraudlent members of goverment  as a nation we have been stolen from by the very people we trust to run the country 
As a nation we should get together and demand those responsible for fraudulent expense claims should be prosecuted for theft as they are no better than any other criminal. 
Please sigh the undersigned and lets make a difference?

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
